TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormatConvertedBitmap extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public NotInheritable Class FormatConvertedBitmap Inherits BitmapSource Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 提供 的像素格式轉換功能。

span.span: Provides pixel format conversion functionality for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 只有在物件初始設定期間發生屬性變更。Property changes can occur only during object initialization. 呼叫發出信號，初始設定開始和來表示已完成初始設定。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用建立的物件建構函式會自動初始化，並且忽略屬性變更。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored. RGB 色彩空間與不同的特性之間的格式轉換為應該使用類別。For format conversions between RGB color spaces with different characteristics, the class should be used. 色彩空間之間的轉換需要來源色彩設定檔及目的色域圖對應，以提供可靠的色彩轉換的色彩設定檔。Conversions between color spaces need a source color profile and destination color profile for gamut mapping to provide a reliable color conversion. 色彩設定檔所提供的參數或和屬性。The color profiles are provided by the parameters of the or by the and properties. 如果映像儲存到檔案後套用轉換，則必須更新映像資料相關的中繼資料標記。Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 初始化使用這個建構函式所建立，您必須執行之間的屬性初始化和呼叫。To initialize a created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between and calls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立的物件會自動初始化。 objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized. 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。After initialization, property changes are ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double AlphaThreshold { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 在轉換成辨識 Alpha 色彩的 Palletized 格式時，取得或設定點陣圖的 Alpha 色板閾值。

span.span: Gets or sets the alpha channel threshold of a bitmap when converting to palletized formats that recognizes an alpha color.

value.span: 這個 的 Alpha 色板閾值。

span.span: The alpha channel threshold for this .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值會用來判斷何種不透明度層級將會對應至已轉換的格式完全透明的色彩。The value is used to determine what level of opacity will be mapped to the fully transparent color in the converted format. 值為 9.8 表示小於 25 的 alpha 值的所有像素，將會對應至的透明色彩。A value of 9.8 implies that any pixel with an alpha value of less than 25 will be mapped to the transparent color. 100 的值會對應所有不是完全透明的色彩不透明的像素。A value of 100 maps all pixels which are not fully opaque to the transparent color. 目的調色盤應該提供透明的色彩。否則，透明的色彩會是最接近零，通常是黑色。The destination palette should provide a transparent color; otherwise, the transparent color will be the one closest to zero, often black. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
